body.p: Two Namespace Management commands are defined for user applications to manage the associated namespaces. Each namespace contains a certain amount of namespace units that need to be contiguous. A namespace unit is the smallest addressable unit for Namespace Management commands. There might be some namespace units located between namespaces that do not belong to any namespaces.

In the sense of system programming, the size of each namespace unit should be a multiple of the flash physical page size that is also a multiple of the supported LBA data sizes by the controller. Due to the foreseeable increase in flash page size, it is appropriate to decide the namespace unit size as 32KB, for example.
